text:
Lovely Thai convenience store snuggled in the corners of the hdb areas of beach road! Patrons and stall owners are Thai, and walking past this shop really made me feel I transcended to Thailand for a brief moment.

It was a one-stop shop provisional store that sells dry and wet goods! There is even a fridge that sells tofu and fresh greens, too. Also, I saw a few instant noodle packets that I only saw in Bangkok here!
Very friendly male boss, always makes you feel welcome! Many stuff from Thailand that you will not be able to get else where!

From the storefront, it looks like a Thai üáπüá≠ minimart. Overcoming the temptation of side dishes, I keep buying them. The dishes that also have vegetables are typical of Thai cuisine. That's good! ! Sometimes you can also hear Thai. It's small but has all the basic things.
